snippet: General Motors has another ignition switch problem that can cause engines to stall, but one was discovered before anyone got hurt.
abstract: General Motors is recalling 3,300 big pickup trucks and SUVs over another ignition switch problem that can cause engines to stall.
lead_paragraph: General Motors has another ignition switch problem that can cause engines to stall, but one was discovered before anyone got hurt.

headline.main: G.M. Recalls Trucks in New Ignition Switch Issue
headline.print_headline: G.M. Recalls Trucks In New Ignition Switch Issue
